title: Supergame (association football)
text:
The SuperGame () is an annual <a href="association%20football">football</a> match at <a href="Ullevi">Nya Ullevi</a> in <a href="Gothenburg">Gothenburg</a>, <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>. Starting in 2012, it is usually played as a game between two top club teams in July or August. While mostly being an <a href="exhibition%20game">exhibition game</a> it's given major attention, as its played between major clubs. Draws are followed up by <a href="penalty%20shoot-out%20%28association%20football%29">penalty shootout</a>s.
SuperGames which involve <a href="Manchester%20City%20F.C.">Manchester City</a> are known as <a href="Super%20Match%20%28association%20football%29">Super Matches</a>.
